Not entirely true KS, some of the reasons for the power failure in
California are arcing conduits from a factory called Unibus in Ohio. the
quality controll manager has made numerous trips out to California to help
assist in fixxing the problems.

I get my information straight from the horses mouth I work there. We
currently have about a dozen sections to send out to replace the defective
ones.

C.Wolf


PS can Japan help it if they're on the wrong end of the technological curve?
It travells West Starting in China travels around the world and ends up in
Japan.
